address:
Power Station of Art
678 Miaojiang Road
Huangpu District
Shanghai 200011

blocks.title: Discount Policies
blocks.body:
Students and Teachers

Students (excluding part-time students) who are registered in mainland China holding student ID or ISIC international student ID, and teachers holding teacher ID are eligible for 50% off of the original ticket price.

Groups

Groups of 20 or more are eligible for 60% off the original ticket price.

Free Visit Policies

Active military officers, retired cadres, families of martyrs, disabilities, guided tour, people over 60 years old, members of the Chinese Artists Association, members of the Shanghai Artists Association, and elementary and preschool children accompanied by adults. (One adult with two children)

International Council of Museums (ICOM)

Members of the International Museum Association can visit for free with valid ICOM documents.

Weekly Free Day

Every Tuesday is free entry for all visitors.
